name: GALAXY 9000
description:
GALAXY 9000

A short shmup/score attack game.

Lock on to enemies for massive score.

Fight your way through 15 waves.

Listen to some boppin' tunes.

CONTROLS

Left = Turn left

Right = Turn right

Up = Accelerate

Down = Deccelerate

Z = Charge/Shoot

X = Insta-Brake
